Blindfear::

Blindfear heard the shots and barely he avoided them in his tank 
mode. He fired two missiles: one ot hell Drak and other two 
Necromancer


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Testifier: Abyssian Badass" <1641coburn@h...> 
wrote:
> ::Symphony/Hell Drak/Necromancer/Decadel::
> 
> Symphony wanted to help defend Maximal City.  He got his machine 
gun ready and headed out.  He shot 22 rounds at Shokaract.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Hell Drak and Necromancer heard the transmission.
> 
> "Let's go kick some Deceptibutt!" Hell Drak said, getting her lazer 
rifle ready and heading out.
> 
> Necromancer got his lazer disc gun ready and followed.  Hell Drak 
fired two lazers at Blindfear, and Necromancer fired a lazer disc at 
Blindfear.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~
> *This is my chance to get some followers!* Decadel, 
a.k.a. "Waterworm" thought to himself.
> 
> Decadel went out into battle.  He sprayed flames from his 
flamethrower around at Shokaract.
> 
> 
> 
> ~Abyssian By Birth~
> ~Badass By Choice~
